comment.author: 22737491@N00
comment._content: This is inside Bayard's Cove Fort, looking upriver (at Dartmouth) . The slipway in the picture is used by the Lower Ferry.

comment.author: 12778388@N06
comment._content: You can still take the same pic. The wooden ladders have been replaced by metal ones. Just outside this fort entrance, the whole quayside was used for the filming of the Onedin Line British tv series of the 1970s.
